title: S14 Ep103: Memoirs of a Future Ghost
itunes:title: Memoirs of a Future Ghost
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS dips into Memoirs of a Future Ghost with guest Heather Scarbro Dobson.

Dave & Tim are joined by Heather Scarbro Dobson and together they probe her fears while seeking out the paranormal, sharing the true, often freaky and/or funny, sometimes sad tales of over a decade investigating ghosts and the people haunted by them.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

For more cool gift items, books & more visit: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Support our sponsors for great deals!
